00006 using namespace std;
00007 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;

00009 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00010 {
00011         const char* celFileName = argv[1];
00012         const char* cdfFileName = argv[2];
00013         FusionCELData cel;
00014         FusionCDFData cdf;
00015         try
00016         {
00017                 cel.SetFileName(celFileName);
00018                 if (cel.Read() == false)
00019                 {
00020                         cout << "Failed to read the file." << endl;
00021                         return 0;
00022                 }
00023                 int n = cel.GetNumCells();
00024                 float sum = 0;
00025                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00026                 {
00027                         sum += cel.GetIntensity(i);
00028                 }
00029                 float avg = sum / n;
00030                 cout << "The average intensity is: " << avg << endl;
00031 
00032         cdf.SetFileName(cdfFileName);
00033         if (cdf.Read() == false)
00034         {
00035             cout << "Failed to read the CDF file." << endl;
00036             return 0;
00037         }
00038         
00039         int nsets = cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00040                 std::string name;
00041         for (int iset=0; iset<nsets; iset++)
00042         {
00043                         name = cdf.GetProbeSetName(iset);
00044             sum = 0;
00045             FusionCDFProbeSetInformation set;
00046             cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iset, set);
00047             int ngroups = set.GetNumGroups();
00048             for (int igroup=0; igroup<ngroups; igroup++)
00049             {
00050                 FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation group;
00051                 set.GetGroupInformation(igroup, group);
00052                 int ncells = group.GetNumCells();
00053                 for (int icell=0; icell<ncells; icell++)
00054                 {
00055                     FusionCDFProbeInformation probe;
00056                     group.GetCell(icell, probe);
00057                     sum += cel.GetIntensity(probe.GetX(), probe.GetY());
00058                 }
00059             }
00060             avg = sum / set.GetNumCells();
00061                         cout << "The average probe set intensity (" << name << ") is " << avg << endl;
00062         }
00063         }
00064         catch (...)
00065         {
00066                 cout << "Error in reading the file.";
00067         }
00068 
00069         return 0;
00070 }
